Understate: The claim may understate the reasons behind the adjustment on sanctions against the FSB by presenting it as a "gift" to Putin, when in fact it was a routine update to ease the burden on American companies.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient support to prove that the adjustment on sanctions was solely done as a "gift" to Putin, as it fails to mention the specific reasons behind the adjustment.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the adjustment on sanctions was solely motivated by favor curried by Russian President Vladimir Putin with the new U.S. president, without providing concrete evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations for the adjustment on sanctions, such as the need to support American companies and ease the effects of the sanctions on them.
